show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #12, Russ Conser - Blue Nest Beef "Biodiversity is Your Best Index"
subtitle: #12, Russ Conser - Blue Nest Beef "Biodiversity is Your Best Index"
summary:
Today we are joined by Russ Conser, President of Grassfed Exchange and Blue Nest Beef.
in a former life, Russ worked for Shell oil and he has a very interesting perspective on Carbon.

https://bluenestbeef.com/

https://www.carboncowboys.org/

https://www.audubon.org/conservation/ranching
